title: Amanda Holden brings adorable daughter Hollie along to interview Angelina Jolie

When Amanda Holden got the chance to interview Hollywood A-lister Angelina Jolie , she seized the opportunity to bring her youngest daughter Hollie along too.

Seven-year-old Hollie is a superfan of the Maleficent movies and was very excited to meet the stars of the sequel, Mistress of Evil.

Mother and daughter duo Amanda and Hollie sat down with Angelina and her onscreen step-daughter Elle Fanning for Heart FM to quiz them on the new film.

"Do you think there's good and bad in everyone?" a confident Hollie grilled the actors.

(Image: Instagram)

(Image: Instagram)

"I think bad is usually people who are afraid and they do bad things," mused Angelina, adding, "but they aren't strong people, those people, and good people are usually very strong."

Hollie then asked them what in the world they would ban given the choice.

'Hate' responded Elle without hesitating. Co-star Angelina agreed and says she would also ban judgement.

(Image: Instagram)

(Image: Instagram)

Amanda, who is mum to Hollie and daughter Lexi, 13, said: "The film is very much about family and how we don't have to be built in the same way to be united. How important is it for you to play roles that give a lovely message to young people?"

Angelina replied: "Usually its the adults that need these messages because u guys already know," gesturing to Hollie.

"The message is that family is not just blood. Half of my children are not my blood but they are absolutely my family. I love my children so much."

(Image: Doug Peters/EMPICS Entertainment)

Angelina, 44, brought her four of her children along to the London premiere of Maleficent: Mistress of Evil earlier this month.

Twins Vivienne and Knox were in attendance as well as Shiloh, 13, Zahara, 14.

While Angelina's eldest son Maddox, 18, accompanied her to the Tokyo premiere as he is currently studying at university in Seoul.
description: The Britain's Got Talent judge took her seven-year-old to meet the stars of the new Maleficent movie
